testingSteps: 1. Go to GitHub repository → Actions tab
2. Select this workflow from the left sidebar
3. Click 'Run workflow' button
4. Select branch (usually 'main') and click 'Run workflow'
5. Monitor execution in real-time
6. Check for any errors or warnings
7. Verify artifacts or outputs if any
1. Go to GitHub repository → Actions tab
2. Select this workflow from the left sidebar
3. Click 'Run workflow' button
4. Select branch (usually 'main') and click 'Run workflow'
5. Monitor execution in real-time
6. Check for any errors or warnings
7. Verify artifacts or outputs if any
8. Wait for scheduled execution or check recent runs
